properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.allow-jms-type
properties.description: Used for JMS users to allow the JMSType header from the JMS spec to specify a FQN classname to use to unmarshal to.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.allow-unmarshall-type
properties.description: If enabled then Jackson CBOR is allowed to attempt to use the CamelCBORUnmarshalType header during the unmarshalling. This should only be enabled when desired to be used.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.collection-type-name
properties.description: Refers to a custom collection type to lookup in the registry to use. This option should rarely be used, but allows to use different collection types than java.util.Collection based as default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.disable-features
properties.description: Set of features to disable on the Jackson com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper. The features should be a name that matches a enum from com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializationFeature, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationFeature, or com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.MapperFeature Multiple features can be separated by comma

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.enable-features
properties.description: Set of features to enable on the Jackson com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper. The features should be a name that matches a enum from com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializationFeature, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationFeature, or com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.MapperFeature Multiple features can be separated by comma

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the cbor data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.object-mapper
properties.description: Lookup and use the existing CBOR ObjectMapper with the given id when using Jackson.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.pretty-print
properties.description: To enable pretty printing output nicely formatted. Is by default false.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.unmarshal-type-name
properties.description: Class name of the java type to use when unmarshalling

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.use-default-object-mapper
properties.description: Whether to lookup and use default Jackson CBOR ObjectMapper from the registry.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.cbor.use-list
properties.description: To unmarshal to a List of Map or a List of Pojo.
